name: Google Plus 130%, No Margins, 3 Columns
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
This style removes the unnecessary margins/paddings on the sides of the Google+ site and zooms the page content (bigger text and column widths) to 130% to fill the extra space, while still maintains the three column layout (above 1552px width). This style does not add anything else other than careful fixes to still look as official as possible.
obsoletion_message: Written for an older version of the site.
additional_info: I made this style for my 17 inch FullHD laptop, because it was so annoying that when I zoomed the site to a comfortable reading size with the browser, it switched to 2 column layout with lots of free space on the sides. This style makes it look like as it should be. 3 columns with no unnecessary margin/paddings on the sides.
